page.title: 10HOLME LACY HOUSE 1
page.content: The hero of Hastings{Wailter de Lacy was given the village of Holme Lacy and{Holme Lacy House.}The village was then exchanged in{1581}to the {Scudamores.}They then inherited Holme Lacy from the marriage of{Thomas {Scudamore.}The first to settle was {Goerge Scudamore. John Scudamore ESQ. of the body to{Henry VIII.}He was then able to obtain Crown divers grants of confiscated lands.It was then sold to the{Wills}who are the tobacco family from Bristol.They then gave it to the council for public use.It was used as an old peoples' home until about {1981.}It is marked on a map as{'H'. { {
